horizontal.name: Waterfall valley and mountains
horizontal.description: Distant mountains with a waterfall leading into a forest valley.

horizontal.name: Blue ridge mountain range
horizontal.description: Lit up Blue Ridged Mountain range whith a group of trees just in the fore front.

horizontal.name: Evening countryside view
horizontal.description: Evening settling on a cloudy, sunny day silhouetting the hilly countryside.

horizontal.name: Frozen mountain lake
horizontal.description: Frozen lake with trees at the foot of a cold, cloudless sky mountain.

horizontal.name: Sunny mountain lake
horizontal.description: A view from the bottom of a lake looking up at distant mountains shining in the afternoon sun.

vertical.name: Pride sunset
vertical.description: A vivid play on a deep coloured sky as the sun sets of a hillside.

vertical.name: Daughters twilight sea sunset
vertical.description: A twilight sunset with stars shining and a mix of clouds and bright sky hues over a calm sea.

vertical.name: Tropical Waterfall
vertical.description: A center stage waterfall with bright flora engulfing it.
